metadata.title: CVE-2021-47215 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5e: kTLS, Fix crash in RX resync flow For the TLS RX resync flow, wemaintain a list of TLS contexts that require some attention, to communicatetheir resync information to the HW. Here we fix list corruptions, byprotecting the entries against movements coming fromresync_handle_seq_match(), until their resync handling in napi is fullycompleted.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
